title: Interval of convergence of a power series

content.question: The power series <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <munderover> <mo>∑</mo> <mrow> <mi>n</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>0</mn> </mrow> <mi>∞</mi> </munderover> <mrow> <msub> <mi>a</mi> <mi>n</mi> </msub> </mrow> </mstyle> <msup> <mrow> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mi>x</mi> <mo>−</mo> <mn>3</mn> </mrow> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mrow> <mi>n</mi> </msup> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@478F@</annotation> </semantics> </math> converges at <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>x</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>5</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG4bGaeyypa0JaaGynaaaa@3BBD@</annotation> </semantics> </math>. Which of the following must be true?
